name: tinted-lens

effect.diamond_pearl: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
effect.platinum: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

short_effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.
